Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers clinched the playoffs for the first time since the 2014 season.
Both teams will start their aces looking for a Game 1 edge with Detroit’s Tarik Skubal (18-4, 2.39 ERA) set to face Houston’s Framber Valdez (15-7, 2.91 ERA)
Others: The article provides information on how to watch the game, including live streams on FuboTV, DirecTV Stream, and Sling TV
